name: Wizards (Flamboozle)
description:
Wizards is a mutliplayer, 3D artillery, turn based game where players play as wizards to defeat their friends to be the last one standing. 2 - 8 players face off in a destructible map taking turns throwing spells at each other to destroy their opponents. Multiple characters with unique spells, power-ups scattered through the map, and meteors falling from the sky all on a floating island allow for an interesting and wacky match every time.

This game was made as a school capstone project for game development at UMBC. I worked as a programmer/lead designer in a team of five members, including both senior level programmers and artists at UMBC. The project lasted over the course of one semester, starting from game pitches to prototypes to the final project.
